title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about a Roche obesity drug, a clash over 340B claims data, and more
description: Roche plans to launch Phase 3 studies of its leading obesity candidate this quarter after the drug led to significant weight loss in a mid-stage trial
content: Roche plans to launch Phase 3 studies of its leading obesity candidate this quarter after the drug led to significant weight loss in a mid-stage trial
